attributes.action: Prevent Overcharging on trains for standing customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and others find as commuters we are regularly having to stand up and travel on trains due to insufficient seat availbility. The train companies do not seem to be doing anything about it. We would like the train companies not to be able to charge more than one third of the normal fare for standing passengers that are being ripped off from high fares and unable to travel in comfort on the trains.
